name: .ROT File Extension
summary: Learn about .ROT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Graphics file used by Homeworld 2, a space-based real-time strategy game; may be used to store icons, 3D textures, and other graphics within the game; can include multiple images in a single file.

content: ROT files are not meant to be edited, but they can be modified with ROT Tool, which will cause the graphics to appear differently in the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
